trial_identification.studytitle: Identifying issues affecting expectation in aged patients on the use of hearing aids.
trial_identification.scientifictitle: Using questionnaires to identify issues affecting expectation in aged patients on the use of hearing aids.

conditions.healthcondition: This study is about the expectation of hearing impaired and aged patients. We want to know what affecting the expectations of this patients has on the use of hearing aids.

interventions.interventions: People who participated of this study are submited to two questionnaires to evaluation their expectation (one created specially for this study), handicap (HHIE-S), an anamnesis to know age, gender and situations of hearing impairment and also degree of hearing loss (basic audiological evaluation), etc. Totally, we used two questionnaires and the application time of each questionnaires was around 15 to 20 minutes. The study lasted two months.

primaryOutcome.outcome: To know what is really important at the moment that patients decide to use hearing aids, and which issues will be affecting their expectations about this.
primaryOutcome.timepoint: Only before the hearing aid fitting.

eligibility.inclusivecriteria: Have neurosensorial hearing loss for mild to moderately-severe degree, bilateral and symmetric and have no experiences with hearing aid use before.
eligibility.exclusivecriteria: Other type anda degree of hearing loss, have some cognitive problems that affect the understanding of the questionnaire, and have some experience with hearing aid use before.
